plot: Allison and her daughters dream of the same mysterious girl who may be linked to the bizarre serial murders of entire families. Also, Joe and his boss find themselves at odds while working on a major project.

Allison dreams about a young woman who asks if that's all she does with her gift and then slits her own throat. Soon after, both Ariel and Bridgitte dream of the same girl where she again takes her own life. Allison is also called in to one of the most bizarre cases ever. The police find a family sitting in the living room as if they were watching television. The only thing is they are all dead, with their blood having been drained from their bodies. When a second family is found a few days later, this time seated at the dinner table, they also find a homeless 17 year-old, Jennifer, hiding in the closet. Meanwhile, Joe's always erratic boss seems to have gone off the deep end completely when the pressure is on in a major project.—garykmcd
